thread.title: Gordon Ramsay is reviewing people’s cooking on Twitter and it’s brutal (20 Photos)
thread.title_full: Gordon Ramsay is reviewing people’s cooking on Twitter and it’s brutal (20 Photos)

author: Matt
title: Gordon Ramsay is reviewing people’s cooking on Twitter and it’s brutal (20 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Celebrity chef (and professional loud person) Gordon Ramsay is currently on a Twitter marathon of reviewing people’s attempts at culinary artistry. From genuine efforts to obvious trolling, Ramsay is leaving short yet anything but sweet reviews of his many follower’s kitchen creations. 
One does have to question what people hope to obtain in asking a man perhaps most famous for calling someone an ‘idiot sandwich’ for advice, but then maybe they are just gluttons for punishment. 
Check out some of his more visceral reviews below and follow the madness on his Twitter here 2
